#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;

const ll mod = 1e9 + 7;

ll pot(ll a, ll b) {
  if (b == 0) return 1;
  ll c = pot(a, b / 2ll);
  c = (c * c) % mod;
  if (b & 1) return (c * a) % mod;
  return c;
}

ll inv(ll x) {
  return pot(x, mod - 2);
}

ll comb(ll a, ll b) {
  ll num = 1;
  for (ll c = 0; c < b; ++c) num = (num * (a - c)) % mod;
  ll den = 1;
  for (ll c = 1; c <= b; ++c) den = (den * c) % mod;
  return (num * inv(den)) % mod;
}

int main() {
  ll n, k, m;
  cin >> n >> k >> m;
  ll pre;
  --n;
  if (k == 1) {
    pre = 1;
  }
  if (k == 2) {
    pre = (1ll + 2ll * n) % mod;
  }
  if (k == 3) {
    pre = (1ll + 4ll * n) % mod;
    pre = (pre + 4ll * comb(n, 2)) % mod;
  }
  if (k == 4) {
    pre = (1ll + 6ll * n) % mod;
    pre = (pre + 12ll * comb(n, 2)) % mod;
    pre = (pre + 8ll * comb(n, 3)) % mod;
  }
  if (k == 5) {
    pre = (1ll + 8ll * n) % mod;
    pre = (pre + 24ll * comb(n, 2)) % mod;
    pre = (pre + 32ll * comb(n, 3)) % mod;
    pre = (pre + 16ll * comb(n, 4)) % mod;
  }
  cout << (m * pre) % mod << endl;
}
